QuestData.Title: Bury Those Cockroaches!
QuestData.Description: North, south, east and west. Those are the locations that you should be concerned about. Surrounding this fortress, within Mightstone Quarry, are four perfectly situated Nerub'ar sinkholes.$B$B<Holgoth hands you a bundle.>$B$BBe very careful with that package, $n. Mishandle it and you'll be dog meat.$B$BInside the bundle are seaforium depth charges. Get to each of those Nerub'ar sinkholes and plant a depth charge at their center point. If all goes well, the tunnels will collapse.$B$BGet a move on!
QuestData.LogDescription: Quartermaster Holgoth at Warsong Hold wants you to use the Seaforium Depth Charge Bundle to destroy the Nerub'ar sinkholes to the south, east, west and north of Warsong Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: That'll stop 'em - at least I think it'll stop 'em. Either way, you've done your part. That's all an orc can ask for, no?
